languages.text: Авгурам удалось обнаружить скопление ценного минерала — вероятно, остатки древнего метеоритного дождя, так как вещество не характерно для этой планеты. Однако сбору ресурса мешает угроза — под самой поверхностью находятся многочисленные пещеры-пустоты. Вероятность обрушения их сводов при посадке шаттла и даже просто от шагов большой группы людей крайне высока.

traits.locale_text: Авгурам удалось обнаружить скопление ценного минерала — вероятно, остатки древнего метеоритного дождя, так как минерал не характерен для этой планеты. Однако сбору ресурса мешает угроза — под самой поверхностью находятся многочисленные пещеры-пустоты. Вероятность обрушения их сводов при посадке шаттла и даже просто от шагов большой группы людей крайне высока.

languages.text: The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.
languages.original_text: Авгурам удалось обнаружить скопление ценного минерала — вероятно, остатки древнего метеоритного дождя, так как вещество не характерно для этой планеты. Однако сбору ресурса мешает угроза — под самой поверхностью находятся многочисленные пещеры-пустоты. Вероятность обрушения их сводов при посадке шаттла и даже просто от шагов большой группы людей крайне высока.

traits.locale_text: The ship's augurs have detected a mineral cluster on the planet's surface, the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The cluster is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the ancient asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. Their ancient structure is incredibly brittle and might not survive a group of people walking on top of it, not to mention a shuttle landing.

The ship's augurs have detected a mineral cluster on the planet's surface, the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The cluster is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the ancient asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. Their ancient structure is incredibly brittle and might not survive a group of people walking on top of it, not to mention a shuttle landing.

The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface, the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The cluster is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly brittle and would likely not survive the weight of a few humans, not to mention a shuttle landing.

The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

languages.text: 虚空舰对这颗行星表面进行了扫描。俄歇矩阵的扫描结果表明，行星表面含有并非源自这颗行星的矿物群。这些矿物群很可能是远古时期的陨石雨造成的结果。这种矿物很有价值，但采集它们会很困难。因为这颗小行星刚好坐落在无数地下洞穴之上，那些古老的隧道非常不稳定，很可能无法承受一大群人的重量，更不用说穿梭机了。
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰对这颗行星表面进行了扫描。俄歇矩阵的扫描结果表明，行星表面含有并非源自这颗行星的矿物群。这些矿物群很可能是远古时期的陨石雨造成的结果。这种矿物很有价值，但采集它们会很困难。因为这颗小行星刚好坐落在无数地下洞穴之上，那些古老的隧道非常不稳定，很可能无法承受一大群人的重量，更不用说穿梭机了。

languages.text: Los augures de la nave han detectado un cúmulo de minerales no nativos en la superficie del planeta; probablemente, restos de una antigua lluvia de meteoritos. La sustancia es valiosa, pero recogerla no será fácil: el asteroide se sitúa justo encima de un sistema de cavernas. Los antiguos túneles subterráneos son extremadamente inestables y no podrán soportar el peso de un gran número de personas, y mucho menos de una lanzadera.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Los augures de la nave han detectado un cúmulo de minerales no nativos en la superficie del planeta; probablemente, restos de una antigua lluvia de meteoritos. La sustancia es valiosa, pero recogerla no será fácil: el asteroide se sitúa justo encima de un sistema de cavernas. Los antiguos túneles subterráneos son extremadamente inestables y no podrán soportar el peso de un gran número de personas, y mucho menos de una lanzadera.

languages.text: 船内のスキャナーが惑星の地表に、惑星固有種ではない鉱物の塊を検出した。おそらく、はるか昔に降り注いだ小惑星の一部だろう。貴重な物質だが、この小惑星の残骸は多数の地下洞窟の真上に位置しているため容易には採取できなさそうだ。古代のトンネルや地下室は非常に不安定で、シャトルはおろか大勢の人間の体重にも耐えられそうにない。
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

traits.locale_text: 船内のスキャナーが惑星の地表に、惑星固有種ではない鉱物の塊を検出した。おそらく、はるか昔に降り注いだ小惑星の一部だろう。貴重な物質だが、この小惑星の残骸は多数の地下洞窟の真上に位置しているため容易には採取できなさそうだ。古代のトンネルや地下室は非常に不安定で、シャトルはおろか大勢の人間の体重にも耐えられそうにない。

languages.text: Die Auguren des Schiffs haben auf der Oberfläche des Planeten einen nicht-heimischen Mineraliencluster entdeckt — vermutlich die Überreste eines uralten Asteroidenschauers. Die Substanz ist wertvoll, doch es wird nicht leicht werden, sie zu sammeln. Der Asteroid sitzt direkt über zahlreichen unterirdischen Höhlen. Die uralten Tunnel und Gewölbe sind unglaublich instabil und würden das Gewicht einer größeren Gruppe von Menschen wohl nicht tragen, geschweige denn das eines Shuttles.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Die Auguren des Schiffs haben auf der Oberfläche des Planeten einen nicht-heimischen Mineraliencluster entdeckt — vermutlich die Überreste eines uralten Asteroidenschauers. Die Substanz ist wertvoll, doch es wird nicht leicht werden, sie zu sammeln. Der Asteroid sitzt direkt über zahlreichen unterirdischen Höhlen. Die uralten Tunnel und Gewölbe sind unglaublich instabil und würden das Gewicht einer größeren Gruppe von Menschen wohl nicht tragen, geschweige denn das eines Shuttles.

languages.text: Les augures du vaisseau ont détecté un amas d'origine étrangère à la surface de la planète, probablement les restes d'une ancienne pluie d'astéroïdes. La substance est précieuse, mais sa collecte ne sera pas facile : l'astéroïde se trouve juste au-dessus de nombreuses cavernes souterraines. Ces anciens tunnels et abris sont extrêmement instables et risquent fort de ne pas supporter le poids d'un grand groupe d'humains, et encore moins d'une navette.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.

traits.locale_text: Les augures du vaisseau ont détecté un amas d'origine étrangère à la surface de la planète, probablement les restes d'une ancienne pluie d'astéroïdes. La substance est précieuse, mais sa collecte ne sera pas facile : l'astéroïde se trouve juste au-dessus de nombreuses cavernes souterraines. Ces anciens tunnels et abris sont extrêmement instables et risquent fort de ne pas supporter le poids d'un grand groupe d'humains, et encore moins d'une navette.

languages.text: Geminin alametleri gezegenin yüzeyinde bu gezegene özgü olmayan bir mineral kümesi saptadı. Muhtemelen eski bir asteroit yağmurundan geriye kalmıştır. Bu materyaller değerli olsa da alması kolay olmayacak: Asteroit sayısız yer altı mağarasının hemen üzerinde duruyor. Mağaraların kadim tünelleri ve odaları son derece hassas durumda. Değil mekik indirmek, büyük ihtimalle geniş bir insan grubunun ağırlığını bile kaldıramayabilir.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected a non-native mineral cluster on the planet's surface — probably the remains of an ancient asteroid shower. The substance is valuable, but collecting it will not be easy: the asteroid sits right above numerous underground caverns. The ancient tunnels and vaults are incredibly unstable and would likely not bear the weight of a large group of humans, let alone a shuttle.
